Today, we watched the Governor's update on reopening schools. We will continue forward with our plan to have school using our Wade-In approach. Below you will find how we will notify families of cases in our schools; we will not use social media to notify families. If we need to close a class or a school, we will do so for a minimum of a two-week period. We thank you in advance for your patience, cooperation, and support. #OnwardTogether In Service, Dr. Evers❤️💙

Jimmy Hoang is feeling thankful at Pass Christian High School.
April 30 at 8:45 PM · Pass Christian, MS ·

These past two days have been such a whirlwind of emotions for me. I want to thank all of my teachers (especially those that wrote me a letter!), these scholarship organizations, and my community for continuing to push me to strive for excellence. There are no words to describe how thankful and grateful I am for all of this, but what more is there to say than that the Pass Christian School District is truly like no other. The time and effort being put into making our senior year so special, in spite of COVID-19, is proof that the Pass Christian Schools are 100% dedicated to their students. During this crazy time, they have given us a reason to smile because of their continued efforts to give us the happy ending that we all want and deserve. This year has been nothing short of a wild ride, but thank you again Pass High for making our Senior Awards Night and Sensational Senior Day still possible. One more thing, congratulations to my fellow classmates on all your accolades!! Class of 2020, this one’s for us!! #WeArePirateStrong ❤️
